member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC
member.summary: Describes the blend state for a render target.

summary.para: Specifies whether to enable (or disable) blending. Set to TRUE to enable blending.
summary.blockquote: [!NOTE] It's not valid for LogicOpEnable and BlendEnable to both be TRUE.

summary.para: Specifies whether to enable (or disable) a logical operation. Set to TRUE to enable a logical operation.
summary.blockquote: [!NOTE] It's not valid for LogicOpEnable and BlendEnable to both be TRUE.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC.SrcBlend
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the operation to perform on the RGB value that the pixel shader outputs. The BlendOp member defines how to combine the SrcBlend and DestBlend operations.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC.DestBlend
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the operation to perform on the current RGB value in the render target. The BlendOp member defines how to combine the SrcBlend and DestBlend operations.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC.BlendOp
member.summary: A -typed value that defines how to combine the SrcBlend and DestBlend operations.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC.SrcBlendAlpha
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the operation to perform on the alpha value that the pixel shader outputs. Blend options that end in _COLOR are not allowed. The BlendOpAlpha member defines how to combine the SrcBlendAlpha and DestBlendAlpha operations.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC.DestBlendAlpha
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the operation to perform on the current alpha value in the render target. Blend options that end in _COLOR are not allowed. The BlendOpAlpha member defines how to combine the SrcBlendAlpha and DestBlendAlpha operations.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC.BlendOpAlpha
member.summary: A -typed value that defines how to combine the SrcBlendAlpha and DestBlendAlpha operations.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC.LogicOp
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the logical operation to configure for the render target.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC.RenderTargetWriteMask
member.summary: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies a write mask.
